title: App shows the white fullscreen
body:
*Type*: Bug


### Description


During the last dogfooding session i faced another bug: app shows white fullscreen (no controls/buttons available and no status bars). 

It happened after i was actively chatting 1-1 and having group chats with many participants and messaging opened. During the first app run i was not having any issues (expect slow UI in general). But then i closed the app, opened it again sign in and went to Main screen, several seconds later app started to lag, switching between screens was laggy and eventually i've ended up seeing completely white screen.

### Reproduction
[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

The issue is not 100% reproducable, but i leave some inputs here:

- Open Status
- Have 1-1 chat with messages (i had 50+)
- Have group chat (6 participants, 50+ messages)
- Have 2 contacts
- Close the app
- Open again and sign in
- Stay at main screen
- Scroll from screen to screen, waiting for the app to become laggy
- Watch the whitescreen

### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
* Status version: http://artifacts.status.im:8081/artifactory/nightlies-local/im.status.ethereum-1d6b94.apk

[comment]: # (Android or iOS.)
* Operating System: Android 8.1, LG Nexus 5x
